scripts.build: npx babel src --extensions ".js" --out-dir dist --copy-files --no-copy-ignored && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently " nodemon src/index.js" "cd ../frontend && npm run start "
scripts.deploy: npm install --frozen-lockfile --legacy-peer-deps && npx babel src --extensions '.js' --out-dir dist --copy-files --no-copy-ignored && cd ../frontend && npm install --frozen-lockfile --legacy-peer-deps && NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider npm run build
